sentences.sContent: In parallel or concordant bedding the strata overlay each other like pages of a book .
sentences.sContent_eng: In parallel or concordant bedding the strata overlay each other like pages of a book .
sentences.sCn: 在平行的或者整合的层面中，地层好象书页一般互相重迭。

sentences.sContent: The harmonization theory sees international law and muncipal law as concordant bodies of doctrine.
sentences.sContent_eng: The harmonization theory sees international law and muncipal law as concordant bodies of doctrine.
sentences.sCn: 协调说认为国际法和国内法是和谐一致的学说体系。

synos.tran: 和谐的；协调的；一致的；和声的

remMethod.val: con (共同) + cord (心) + ant (…的) → 同心的 → 一致的 → 协调的

words.tran: 调和，一致；用语索引；著作或作家全集的重要用字索引

trans.tranOther: being in agreement or having the same regular pattern
